channel.title: xISBN on Mark A. Matienzo
channel.description: Recent content in xISBN on Mark A. Matienzo

item.title: Python WorldCat API module now available
item.description: I'd like to humbly announce that I've written a pre-pre-alpha Python module for working with the WorldCat Search API and the xID APIs. The code needs a fair amount of work, namely unit tests and documentation. I've released the code under the GPL. The module, called "worldcat", is available from the Python Package Index. You can also checkout a copy of the code from my Subversion repository.
